verses.text: \w From|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* apostle \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w on|strong="G2596"\w* behalf \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w chosen|strong="G1588"\w* \w people|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* truth \w which|strong="G3588"\w* makes \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*

– \w and|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* based \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* eternal \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w never|strong="G3739"\w* lies, \w promised|strong="G1861"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* \w ages|strong="G5550"\w* \w began|strong="G1909"\w*,

\w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w revealed|strong="G5319"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1722"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1722"\w* \w message|strong="G3056"\w*, \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w preaching|strong="G2782"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w entrusted|strong="G4100"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w command|strong="G2003"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Savior|strong="G4990"\w*.

\w To|strong="G2532"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w*, \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w true|strong="G1103"\w* \w child|strong="G5043"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* shared \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w May|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Savior|strong="G4990"\w*, bless \w you|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G1473"\w* \w you|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*. Mission of Titus in Crete

\w My|strong="G1722"\w* \w reason|strong="G5484"\w* \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w leaving|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Crete|strong="G2914"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G2525"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w order|strong="G2443"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w* \w left|strong="G5484"\w* unfinished, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w appoint|strong="G2525"\w* church \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w various|strong="G2596"\w* \w towns|strong="G4172"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w myself|strong="G1473"\w* \w directed|strong="G1299"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2192"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1520"\w* irreproachable character, \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G1722"\w* partners, \w whose|strong="G5101"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w believers|strong="G4103"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G1520"\w* \w and|strong="G1135"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w never|strong="G3361"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* open \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* charge \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w being|strong="G1510"\w* wild \w or|strong="G2228"\w* unruly.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* supervisor, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w steward|strong="G3623"\w*, \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w to|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* blameless character – \w not|strong="G3361"\w* arrogant \w or|strong="G3361"\w* \w quick-tempered|strong="G3711"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w given|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G1163"\w* drunkeness, violence \w or|strong="G3361"\w* shady money-making.

Instead, they should \w be|strong="G3741"\w* \w hospitable|strong="G5382"\w*, love \w what|strong="G5358"\w* \w is|strong="G1342"\w* \w good|strong="G5358"\w*, \w self-controlled|strong="G4998"\w*, \w upright|strong="G1342"\w*, people \w of|strong="G1342"\w* \w holy|strong="G3741"\w* life \w and|strong="G1342"\w* disciplined,

holding firmly \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w trustworthy|strong="G4103"\w* \w message|strong="G3056"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w has|strong="G1510"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w taught|strong="G1322"\w* – \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w encourage|strong="G3870"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1322"\w*, \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w refute|strong="G1651"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* contradict \w it|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* undisciplined \w persons|strong="G1537"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w lead|strong="G1510"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w* astray \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* nonsense, \w especially|strong="G3122"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* group advocating \w the|strong="G2532"\w* necessity \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*.

\w They|strong="G3739"\w* \w need|strong="G1321"\w* \w to|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1163"\w* \w kept|strong="G3739"\w* quiet \w as|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* disrupt \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w households|strong="G3624"\w* \w by|strong="G3739"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G1163"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w*, simply \w to|strong="G1163"\w* \w make|strong="G1163"\w* shameful financial \w gain|strong="G2771"\w*.

\w It|strong="G3004"\w* \w was|strong="G4396"\w* \w a|strong="G1537"\w* Cretan – \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G2398"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* – \w who|strong="G5100"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: ‘\w Cretans|strong="G2912"\w* \w are|strong="G4396"\w* always \w liars|strong="G5583"\w*, \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2342"\w*, \w and|strong="G4396"\w* lazy \w gluttons|strong="G1064"\w*.’ \w This|strong="G1537"\w* statement \w is|strong="G5100"\w* true.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w rebuke|strong="G1651"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* sharply, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w pay|strong="G4337"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w attention|strong="G4337"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2451"\w* legends, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* directions \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* turn \w their|strong="G2532"\w* backs \w on|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* truth.

\w To|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w whose|strong="G3588"\w* \w minds|strong="G3563"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* ritually \w pure|strong="G2513"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w whose|strong="G3588"\w* \w minds|strong="G3563"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* tainted \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unbelieving \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w*, \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w minds|strong="G3563"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w consciences|strong="G4893"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* alike polluted.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* claim \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w by|strong="G4314"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w actions|strong="G2041"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w deny|strong="G3588"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*. \w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* detestable \w and|strong="G2532"\w* disobedient \w and|strong="G2532"\w* useless \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G3956"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.
